SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

rmp
Class ReliableMessageFactory

java.lang.Object
  rmp.ReliableMessageFactory
public class ReliableMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes

Description:
This class has the puprose to provide some ease
-- on the construction of a message,
-- on extracting some message elements and
-- it also provides the constants of the RMS [all messages are RMS specific].

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Company: JXTA ORG

Field Summary
(package private) static java.lang.String CHANNEL
          The name of the element that represents the ID of the channel through which the message is sent.
(package private) static java.lang.String DATA
          The name of the element that represents the data of the message.
(package private) static java.lang.String DEST_ID
          The name of the element that represents the destination of the receiver, only used int a retransmission message.
(package private) static java.lang.String MESSAGE_SEQ_NUM
          The name of the element that represents the sequence number of the message [it is set by the root peer of the channel]
(package private) static java.lang.String MESSAGETYPE
          The name of the element that represents the message type of a message.
(package private) static java.lang.String MSG_BULK
          The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is only carrying data.
(package private) static java.lang.String MSG_CLOSE_CHANNEL
          The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a channel closure message.
(package private) static java.lang.String MSG_JOIN_REQ
          The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a Channel Join Request message.
(package private) static java.lang.String MSG_JOIN_RESP
          The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a Channel Join Respond message.
(package private) static java.lang.String MSG_NACK
          The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a NACK
(package private) static java.lang.String MSG_RETR
          The value that element MESSAGETYPE has, when the message is a retransmission message.
(package private) static java.lang.String MULTICASTPATH
          The name of the element that represents the multicast path of the multicast tree that the message has traversed till now.
static java.lang.String NAMESPACE
          The standard namespace for all RMS messages
(package private) static java.lang.String SENDERID
          The name of the element that represents the peer ID of the sender of a message.
(package private) static java.lang.String SENDERNAME
          The name of the element that represents the peer name of the sender of a message.
(package private) static java.lang.String SERV_PIPE_ID
          The name of the element that represents the pipeID of the ServerPipe of the ChannelProvider that sent us the join response

Method Detail

createQueryMessage

public static net.jxta.endpoint.Message createQueryMessage(java.lang.String snd_nmame,
                                                           java.lang.String snd_id,
                                                           java.lang.String ch_id)
Creates a Join Request message for joining into a channel.

Parameters:
snd_nmame - The peerName of the sender of the message.
snd_id - The peerID of the sender of the message.
ch_id - The ID of the channel that we have the desire to join to.
Returns:
Message

createResponseMessage

public static net.jxta.endpoint.Message createResponseMessage(java.lang.String snd_name,
                                                              java.lang.String snd_id,
                                                              java.lang.String ch_id,
                                                              java.lang.String serv_pipe_id)
Creates a Join Response message for answering a Provider of a channel to a Join Request message.

Parameters:
snd_id - The peerID of the sender of the message [the channel Provider].
ch_id - The ID of the channel that concearns the sender of the Join Request.
serv_pipe_id - The pipeID of the JxtaServerPipe of a provider, on which a bidi Pipe can connect.
Returns:
Message

createBulkDataMessage

public static net.jxta.endpoint.Message createBulkDataMessage(java.lang.String snd_name,
                                                              java.lang.String snd_id,
                                                              java.lang.String ch_id,
                                                              int seq,
                                                              java.lang.String data)
Creates a simple data message [called by the root of the channel].

Parameters:
snd_id - The peerID of the sender of the message [the channel Provider].
ch_id - The ID of the channel through which the message is going to be multicasted.
seq - The sequence number of the message.
data - The data that we need to transfer.
Returns:
Message

createNACKMessage

public static net.jxta.endpoint.Message createNACKMessage(java.lang.String snd_name,
                                                          java.lang.String snd_id,
                                                          java.lang.String ch_id,
                                                          int lostseqnum)
Creates a NACK message.

Parameters:
snd_id - The peerID of the sender of the message [the channel Provider].
ch_id - The ID of the channel.
lostseqnum - The sequence number of the message that we lost.
Returns:
Message

createRetransmissionMessage

public static net.jxta.endpoint.Message createRetransmissionMessage(java.lang.String snd_name,
                                                                    java.lang.String snd_id,
                                                                    java.lang.String ch_id,
                                                                    int seq,
                                                                    java.lang.String data,
                                                                    java.lang.String dest)
Creates a retransmission message.

Parameters:
snd_id - The peerID of the sender of the message [the channel Provider].
ch_id - The ID of the channel.
seq - The sequence number of the message.
data - The data that are retransmitted.
dest - The peerID of the destination of the retransitted data.
Returns:
Message

createChannelClosureMessage

public static net.jxta.endpoint.Message createChannelClosureMessage(java.lang.String chann_id)
Creates a closure message. This message is sent when the root of the channel has to close the channel.
It then is multicasted and sent to all the joined peers of the channel.

Parameters:
chann_id - The ID of the channel.
Returns:
Message
